works.description:
"ElaKiri" is registered Trademark in Sri 

Lanka Government under the INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY ACT, No. 36 OF 2003. And 

we are using this name for last 6 years.
This website uses our trademark name and posting some illegal gossip site.
 
We tried to contact this person but he is hiding the details because the  
illegal nature of this web site.
Thanks.
